name: Apple Pie
description:
A sweet, cute friendship/ dating sim with roleplaying elements.

* Please read the postmortem here before playing!*

                                                        

  • Make friends, give them gifts, and hang out!      
  • 5 girls to get to know and befriend.              
  • Discover the secrets behind their pasts and solve mysteries!
  • Enjoy the side stories told by NPC interactions!
  • Discover another world when going to sleep...

Game length: 3-4 hours.

Controls: Press Fn+F6 to activate fullscreen. ESC to access the menu.

Portraits by Allusion. Ending card art by Marie Arroyo.

Characters, from left to right:

Amanda,  a mysterious girl from another world.
Rose, the student council president who struggles with making friends.
Erika, an outgoing girl who brings everyone together.
Lucia, the protagonist.
Elissa, a sleepy, lazy girl with a pure heart.
Iris, a shy girl with many secrets.
Sophia, a hot-headed young lady who has many opinions on everything.

This game is considered canceled after 7 years of development. I am moving on from RPG Maker. Thank you for the support through all these years.
